Pre-Game Insights: Interim England boss Lee Carsley makes his Wembley bow on Tuesday night as his side host Finland in Nations League Group B2.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England's relegation in the last Nations League campaign sees them drawn alongside Finland, the Republic of Ireland and Greece in Group B, which means there is added pressure on Carsley to continue his winning start.
